title: Strengthening Media Literacy in the Digital Age: Mobile-Based Language Training for Responding to Information Influence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills, experience in internet-based information retrieval, and foundational grammar/vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: A language-centric program to enhance information influence response capabilities for defense sector professionals. Composed of mobile learning modules executable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on strengthening practical media literacy through text analysis/production/feedback processes.

learning_goals: Learners identify various types of disinformation texts with 80% accuracy and demonstrate critical reading skills
Learners practice strategic expression and communication strategies in response to information influence activities at least three times in gamified scenarios
Learners strengthen media-critical thinking and argumentative writing skills by exchanging peer feedback through a formative assessment system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
